name: Multiplayer Roulette
description:
Multiplayer Roulette now Available! 

Practice your Roulette knowledge, with your friends, without losing real money. Join a quick game or create your public or private rooms! Enjoy of the European and American version and become a pro!

Game Features:
  • Free Chips -  Recieve 1000 credits to play everytime you join or create a game.
  • Private Rooms -   Create your own private room, create between the European and American version, customize the time to place the bets.
  • Chat with players -  Make new friends inside the game.
  • NO ANOYING REGSITRATION  -  Get into the action. No need for registration, create a room or join one and play!
  • Physics animation - Our Roulette uses a physics random result, NO CHEATING!
  • Simple  Multiplayer Roulette -   We made a game that is easy to use and play, with the commun rules and easy UI to undestand
You like our game?   

Our template version will be available in the Unity Asset Store soon!
